trans-unit.source: A trigger action that provides functionality for seeking (skipping) to a specified time within the active period of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 활성 기간 내 지정 된 시간에 검색 (건너뛰기)에 대 한 기능을 제공 하는 트리거 동작은 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use a SeekStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to seek a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

Note that seek operations do not take the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings into account: the storyboard is treated as though it had a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 검색 작업을 스토리 보드를 사용 하지 않는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>설정을 고려: 스토리 보드 것 처럼 처리 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>1 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: Seeking a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> triggers its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.

Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지, 다시 시작, 중지 또는 스토리 보드에 대화형으로 수 일시 중지, 제어 그렇지 않으면 다시 시작 하거나 다른 방식으로 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>대화형으로 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>속성의 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>개체 (같은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> 참조 하 여 제어할 수</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>지정 되어 있지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>으로 시작한 후에 대화형으로 제어할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [하는 방법: 한 스토리 보드 후 시작을 제어 하려면 이벤트 트리거를 사용 하 여](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 자세한 정보에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.
trans-unit.target: 으로 스토리 보드 이동할 앞으로 또는 뒤로 검색 원점 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*> 에서 크기를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A positive or negative value that specifies the amount by which the storyboard should move forward or backward from the seek origin <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.
trans-unit.target: 으로 스토리 보드 이동할 앞으로 또는 뒤로 검색 원점 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Origin*> 에서 크기를 지정 하는 양수 또는 음수 값

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position from which this seek operation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 이 검색 작업의 있는 위치를 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>적용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: The position from which this seek operation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> is applied.

Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> property of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 반환 하는지 여부를 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>속성 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"> </xref> serialize 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard.Offset*> property of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"></xref> should be serialized; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true** 경우는 <> </> *> 속성을이 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SeekStoryboard"> </xref> 직렬화 건너뛸 필요가 없으면, * *false** 합니다.
